main_definition: To act or serve as a symbol, stand in for someone/something, or to give an indication of the nature or characteristics of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Acting on behalf of someone else
meanings_and_examples.example: She is representing her client at the court hearing.
The Olympic torch represents unity and peace among nations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exhibiting certain characteristics or qualities that represent a particular group, concept, or idea
meanings_and_examples.example: His work is often praised for its ability to represent the struggles of everyday people.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Using someone or something as an example in conversation or writing
meanings_and_examples.example: She was representing a diverse group of individuals who had all faced similar challenges.
